channel.title: Scorned TB fail
channel.description:
#### What happened? Scorned. I don't see my TB's appear in chat. Others seem to.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should see my TB.
#### Steps to reproduce: Get a scorned game and Trollbox someone.
#### Comments: The very first trollbox of the game, i saw, but the rest didn't show up for me.

item.title: Scorned TB fail
item.dc:creator: Thundie85
item.description:
What happened?

Scorned. I don’t see my TB’s appear in chat. Others seem to.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should see my TB.

Steps to reproduce:

Get a scorned game and Trollbox someone.

Comments: The very first trollbox of the game, i saw, but the rest didn’t show up for me.

Read full topic
